String: The S3 key for the lambda code zip file
Custom CloudFormation resource to update a KMS Key Policy
The ARN of the lambda function
The S3 Bucket that holds the lambda code

[{u'PolicyName': u'CloudFormationRead', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'cloudformation:DescribeStacks'], u'Resource': u'arn:aws:cloudformation:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}, {u'PolicyName': u'AllowLambdaToWriteLogs', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'logs:CreateLogStream', u'logs:PutLogEvents'], u'Resource': u'arn:aws:logs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:log-group:/aws/lambda/*:*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': [u'logs:CreateLogGroup'], u'Resource': u'arn:aws:logs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:*', u'Effect': u'Allow', u'Sid': u'AllowLambdaToCreateLogGroups'}]}}, {u'PolicyName': u'KMSPolicyUpdate', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'kms:GetKeyPolicy', u'kms:PutKeyPolicy'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
